title: Tech News: ICE ICE Surveillance
itunes:title: Tech News: ICE ICE Surveillance
description:
All right, stop! Collaborate and listen; ICE is back with invasive digital surveillance covering essentially all US residents. Plus the SEC is after Elon Musk (again), the EU might outlaw end to end encryption and we learn what Google has announced at its I/O event.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: ICE, privacy, security, digital surveillance, data brokers, Pentagon, drones, microwave, Elon Musk, Twitter, SEC, Meta, Facebook, Reality Labs, content moderation, HB 20, Texas, Google, I/O, mixed reality, augmented reality, Bethesda, Starfield, Redfall, Netflix, Disney+
